t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

s: January 6, 2023 - But just how big is this ever-increasing Amazon brand portfolio? Amazon has been partnering up with dozens of manufacturers in recent years to diversify its product portfolio. In a 2019 judicial hearing, it claimed to be listing 150k+ items from over 45 private brands.

t: What Brands Are Gated on Amazon? A Complete Guide for Sellers
s: Amazon brand gating is a way to protect both brands and consumers. It’s an approval process that third-party sellers must go through to sell specific brands or products on the platform. It involves multiple checks and balances to ensure only authorized sellers can list those items, to preserve ...

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
